SEARCH
Package Customers

Class RewardsCustomer

java.lang.Object
Customers.Customer
Customers.RewardsCustomer
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonIdentifiable
public class RewardsCustomer extends Customer
The RewardsCustomer class extends the Customer class to represent a customer with a loyalty account.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RewardsCustomer(String name, String username, String password, String phoneNumber, String customerEmail)
    Constructor that creates a RewardsCustomer object with the default discount options from the LoyaltyAccount class.
    RewardsCustomer(String name, String username, String password, String phoneNumber, String customerEmail, double initialPointsBalance, Discount discount)
    Constructor that allows customizing the initial points balance and rewards discount for the loyalty account.

      name - the name of the customer
      username - the username of the customer
      password - the password of the customer
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the customer
      customerEmail - the email address of the customer

    • RewardsCustomer

      public RewardsCustomer(String name, String username, String password, String phoneNumber, String customerEmail, double initialPointsBalance, Discount discount)
      Constructor that allows customizing the initial points balance and rewards discount for the loyalty account.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the customer
      username - the username of the customer
      password - the password of the customer
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the customer
      customerEmail - the email address of the customer
      initialPointsBalance - the initial points balance for the account
      discount - the initial rewards discount for the account

      customerEmail - the email address of the customer
